item.title: Announcing psycopg2-wrapper
item.description: psycopg2 is a postgresql database adapter for database operations. It is used behind many orm tools. I prefer to use orm tools for big projects and psycopg2 for small projects. When I use psycopg2 in my projects, I realize that I always create a database.py and use it to execute sql commands so I have decided to create a package and publish it. It’ s very basic psycopg2 wrapper and it works fine for basic usage.
